title: Solve for R in compound circuit of Req

content.question: The diagram above shows a segment of a circuit for which the equivalent resistance between points <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="5 ohms" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext>Ω</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the value of resistor <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
